cross.datastructures.workflow
Interface IWorkflow

All Superinterfaces:
IConfigurable, IEventSource<IWorkflowResult>
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultWorkflow
public interface IWorkflow
extends IEventSource<IWorkflowResult>, IConfigurable

Workflow models a sequence of produced IWorkflowResults, which usually are files created by IWorkflowElement objects.

Author:
Nils.Hoffmann@cebitec.uni-bielefeld.de
